overview: The memory contains a user request for significant changes to an app, including the removal of a counter feature and the addition of an onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde. The system responds with a high-level plan and a detailed public interface diff.
key_events: User requested removal of the counter feature and addition of an onboarding flow for the Gyde app
System provided a high-level plan for the requested changes
System provided a detailed public interface diff
user_requests: User requested the removal of the counter feature
User requested the creation of an onboarding flow for the Gyde app, including specific pages and phrases
system_responses: System provided a high-level plan, outlining the new and modified features, removed features, architectural changes, and cross-cutting concerns
System provided a detailed public interface diff, outlining the additions, removals, and changes to the app's structure and functionality
current_state: The current state of the project involves significant changes to the app's structure and functionality, including the removal of the counter feature and the addition of an onboarding flow for the Gyde app. The system has provided a high-level plan and a detailed public interface diff for these changes.
